name: UMass Asteroid Assassin
description:
This game was submitted to the HackUMass IX Hackathon,  and was chosen as the Space Force "Best Space App"  for HackMass IX by Major League Hacking

To Move Forward/Back: W/S or Up-Arrow/Down-Arrow

To Rotate: A/D or Left-Arrow/ Right-Arrow

To Fire Turret: Spacebar

Current Version: AsteroidAssassin.1.02

Note: The menu selection keys are the arrows and "enter" key
